target: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_CHOICE1A1_101_000<tab>あなたはここで何をしている？

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_001<tab>Oh, I like housing─that is to say, I <var 1A 02 /var>like<var 1A 01 /var> it. I roam this fair land─fairest!─touring all the adventurer settlements. You might say I'm a flatspotter. Or a house peeper.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_001おじさんね、そうとう家造りが好きでね。
各国の「冒険者居住区」を見てまわってるんだよねぇ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_100_001<tab>Oh, one of us, are you? A fellow house peeper, very <var 1A 02 /var>good<var 1A 01 /var>! You must talk to the resident caretakers then. Connections are everything in this...proclivity.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_100_001おや、君も家造りに興味があるのかい？
だったら「居住区担当官」から詳しい話を聞けるよ。
いやぁ、家造りは実に奥が深いねぇ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_002<tab>That cove right there is where Rycharde Mistbeard came home to his hideout. Mmm, lore! And brine! This is Mist, <var 1A 02 /var>the<var 1A 01 /var> residential area for adventurers─and a fine piece of Limsa it is too.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_002海賊王「霧髭」の伝説残る入江……
リムサ・ロミンサの冒険者居住区「ミスト・ヴィレッジ」！
いやぁ、リゾート気分だねぇ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_003<tab>Ah, the Goblet! Now who doesn't want to drink from <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>, I ask. I was planning a trip to Ul'dah just to see this place, but plans kept getting pushed back. But finally, I'm here!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_003荒野にそびえる勝利の酒杯……
ウルダハの冒険者居住区「ゴブレットビュート」！
いやぁ、見てみたかったんだよねぇ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_004<tab>Now, this one might be my favorite residential area right now. The Lavender Beds! Such a relaxing area, don't you think? I've had a rather stressful few years, to be honest. The quiet life in Gridania, among the trees... <sigh>
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_004母なる大樹に、美しい草花……
グリダニアの冒険者居住区「ラベンダーベッド」！
いやぁ、そうとうくつろげますねぇ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_005<tab>Lest you wonder, Shirogane means platinum, and small wonder this place is named so. That pristine, glittering sand is a treat for eyes and feet alike. Truly a slice of Far Eastern paradise, this!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_005白金に輝く浜辺に拓かれた異人居留地……
ひんがしの国の冒険者居住区「シロガネ」！
いやぁ、粋だねぇ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_006<tab>I had heard the people of Ishgard sought assistance to rebuild in the wake of the Dragonsong War, but never did I expect they would accomplish all this, and so quickly! Indeed, it is the epitome of masonry.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_006竜詩戦争の終結に伴い、訪れてみたんだが……
イシュガルドの冒険者居住区「エンピレアム」！
うーん、輝いているねぇ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_004_000<tab>I say, is this your chocobo by any chance? He <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var>? Wonderful, wonderful!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_004_000おじさんね、さっき迷子を保護したんだ。
これは、君のチョコボだろう？
君とはぐれてしまって、とっても寂しそうだったよ。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_004_001<tab>The fellow wandered here a while ago, looking rather glum for having been separated from his <var 08 E905 ((mistress)) ((master)) /var>. I'm glad that you came by when you did─nothing warms the heart like a happy reunion!
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_004_001君の役に立てて、おじさんも気分がいいよ。
いやぁ、よかったよかった。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_004_002<tab>Your chocobo companion has been returned to you, and may once again be summoned to your side.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_004_002あなたの元にチョコボが戻ってきました。
再び、バディとして呼べるようになりました。
